item.title: Chilly add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "People with courage and character always seem sinister to the rest." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Chilly add a quote by Thor Heyerdahl
item.description: "Borders I have never seen one. But I have heard they exist in the minds of some people." -- Thor Heyerdahl

item.title: Chilly add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Chilly add a quote by Natsuo Kirino
item.description: "In order to induce the process of decay, water is necessary. I think that, in the case of women, men are the water." -- Natsuo Kirino

item.title: Chilly add a quote by Le Thi Diem Thuy
item.description: "When I grow up I am going to be the gangster we are all looking for." -- Le Thi Diem Thuy

item.title: Chilly add a quote by Jared Diamond
item.description: "Perhaps our greatest distinction as a species is our capacity, unique among animals, to make counter-evolutionary choices." -- Jared Diamond

item.title: Chilly add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering - and it's all over much too soon." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Chilly add a quote by William S. Burroughs
item.description: "Language is a virus from outer space" -- William S. Burroughs

item.title: Chilly add a quote by Tom Waits
item.description: "I've seen it all through the yellow windows of the evening train... " -- Tom Waits

item.title: Chilly add a quote by David Mitchell
item.description: "...there ain't no journey what don't change you some." -- David Mitchell

item.title: Chilly add a quote by Bill Hicks
item.description: "I'm glad mushrooms are against the law, because I took them one time, and you know what happened to me? I laid in a field of green grass for four hours going, "My God! I love everything." Yeah, now if that isn't a hazard to our country â€¦ how are we gonna justify arms dealing when we realize that we're all one?" -- Bill Hicks
